## The Discipline of Continuing

Most people underestimate how much spiritual and architectural discipline is required not to start, but to continue. This piece explores why continuation is the real test of faithfulnessâ€”both in work and in lifeâ€”and why systems fail when builders confuse momentum with obedience.
